name: RandomShooter
description:
-Controls-

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

f3 to fullscreen / window mode

R to restart

J to go to previous level

L to go to next level

-Music-

Atmosphere by Me (first level music)

ParagonX9 -Neutralized  (All the rest of the game)

Making this game was wonderful, thanks for everything everyone and sorry for the bugs :)

This is where I should put my contacts and other projects but I am still working on my first public project so I will only leave this where when it comes out I will notify

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCA6jLwwp_J2MpKdZCHF6PGQ
